Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、<Blue>王の盾<White>がヒューマの娘を さらう理由を聞かなかったか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, did you hear why the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> was kidnapping Huma girls?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、おれは何も…… でも、サレは顔を見て選んでたぜ？
Entry.EnglishText: No, not at all... But Saleh looked at their faces before he chose them, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 弟のおれが言うのも何だが、 ウチの姉貴はけっこう美人だからな。
Entry.EnglishText: It might not mean much considering I'm her brother, but my sister is rather beautiful.

Entry.JapaneseText: 案外、お妃選びだったりしてな……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm surprised that she was chosen to be a consort...

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ姫の相手なら、 ガジュマの男じゃないのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: If Princess Agarte was looking for a partner, wouldn't it be a Gajuma male?

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、それもそうだなぁ…… ううーん……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, I guess you're right... Hmmm...
